laboratory_examinations.findings: Confirmed MH-susceptible diagnosis in the in vitro halothane/caffeine muscle test.
Elevated resting creatine kinase levels of 700 U/l.
Maximal serum creatine kinase elevation of 1655 U/l.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Histopathologic examination of a muscle biopsy
Genetic screening for MH-related mutations in the RYR1 gene
laboratory_examinations.findings: Identified Arg2435His mutation (G7304 3A) in all MH-susceptible family members.
Results proved that a true relationship between the investigated generations was almost certain.
